about_the_game:
This game is a stand-alone game. Purchase can unlock all the content of the game itself, including all endings and achievements in the classic mode.
Games are word-based games that express characters, tasks, battles, collections, and more through words.
All historical figures in the game can be accepted as teammates, can fight, and all imaginable characters can be challenged!
The background of the game is the Three Kingdoms. Here, defeating Lu Bu and Zuo Ci to complete the God of War is not the ultimate goal.
Overlord can be completed, and other endings can also be completed, yes, this is a multi-ending game.
For those who like to collect achievements, there are dozens of achievements waiting for you to achieve!
If you like character appreciation, hundreds of characters are recruited.
Everyone's weapons can be dropped. Of course, if you want Fang Tianhuaji and Chitu, you still have to prepare!
Our game is perfect for friends who are bored and want to pass the time.

This game is a stand-alone game. Purchase can unlock all the content of the game itself, including all endings and achievements in the classic mode.
Games are word-based games that express characters, tasks, battles, collections, and more through words.
All historical figures in the game can be accepted as teammates, can fight, and all imaginable characters can be challenged!
The background of the game is the Three Kingdoms. Here, defeating Lu Bu and Zuo Ci to complete the God of War is not the ultimate goal.
Overlord can be completed, and other endings can also be completed, yes, this is a multi-ending game.
For those who like to collect achievements, there are dozens of achievements waiting for you to achieve!
If you like character appreciation, hundreds of characters are recruited.
Everyone's weapons can be dropped. Of course, if you want Fang Tianhuaji and Chitu, you still have to prepare!
Our game is perfect for friends who are bored and want to pass the time.
name: 三国英雄坛

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is an open-ended text strategy simulation game with no specific route to achieve achievements or impact the ending. The direction of the game is determined by the players themselves, recruit the characters they want to recruit, and collect their favorite props.
